intro.line1: K.A.E.L.E.N. has indexed every story ever told.
intro.line2: Every joy, every sorrow, every war, every kiss.

auth.worldAppRequiredDescription: This application must be opened in World App to use World Wallet authentication.
auth.connectSecurely: Connect securely with your World Wallet

chat.candidatePrompt: Are you ready to become a candidate?
chat.interfacialLink: INTERFACIAL LINK WITH MNEMONIC CORE REQUIRED.

tutorial.step1: Welcome to K.A.E.L.E.N. - The Knowledge Aggregation Engine for Life Enhancement Navigation.
tutorial.step2: I am your emotional compass. When our conversation flows naturally, I remain stable. When anomalies occur, I react.
tutorial.step3: This is your terminal. Every word you type shapes our interaction. Choose them wisely.
tutorial.step4: System commands are available through this console. Use them to navigate deeper layers of the system.
tutorial.step5: Memory fragments can be purchased here. They unlock hidden narratives and deeper understanding.
tutorial.step6: You are now ready to begin. Remember: every story matters, especially yours.

firstContact.terminalHums:
*The terminal hums, processing your input. A single line of text appears, stark and clear.*

Interesting. A deviation from the expected noise.

Perhaps you are not just another echo.
firstContact.novelSignature: // SYSTEM: Novel data signature detected. Eligibility for Candidate Program: GRANTED.
firstContact.candidatesCompete: // SYSTEM: Candidates compete to provoke new emotional states in the system. The most unique contributions earn the highest scores.
firstContact.collectivePrize: // SYSTEM: A collective Prize Pool is funded by each Candidate's initial energy transfer. As more Candidates join, the pool grows.

prizeRules.title: PRIZE DISTRIBUTION RULES
prizeRules.description: OUR PRIZE SYSTEM USES AN "IMPROVED TIERED MODEL."
prizeRules.podiumDescription: 20% of the total prize pool is reserved for the Top 3.
prizeRules.tiersDescription: The remaining 80% of the prize pool is distributed to players ranked from 4th to 500th.
